jobDescription: Plan, develop and execute UI test scripts for the KBRA KFI product, written in the Cypress testing library
Maintain and provide ownership of UI test continuous integration suite
Work with product owners and stakeholders to plan and develop a user-driven testing strategy for the KBRA KFI product
Align with fellow developers to ensure that quality is baked into deliverables from the onset and is continually monitored
Plan, develop and execute automated test scripts and suite for the KBRA Analytics CMS project, written in TestCafe and Cypress JavaScript testing libraries

Work closely on an agile team with developers and product stakeholders to develop and execution of manual test scenarios, along with performing regression and smoke testing as part of user story completion
Manage ownership of automated test suite for the CMS project along with managing Jenkins CI suite to ensure ongoing product quality during the development cycle
Discuss testing methods and concerns with product owner along with financial/business end users to align with our shared product vision
Update existing automation code based on new requirements and user interface updates

Provide ownership of the automation suite, plan new testing scenarios to achieve optimal E2E test coverage, improve existing test performance and research innovative ways for automation to provide the most value
Developed and executed manual and automated user story tests against Sparta’s entire product suite to ensure superior software quality

Provided testing efforts to contribute towards completion of Sparta’s next-generation TrackWise version 9.0 project, TrackWise version 9.3 project along with Stratas and TrackWise Digital cloud platforms
Contributed towards completion of QA release activities including sanity testing, regression testing and validation efforts
Worked cross-functionally with developers, product management, and support to prevent, report, and resolve product defects
Followed Agile methodology by participating in requirements review sessions, daily standup meetings, team sprint retrospectives and product demonstrations
Assisted in the development of functional requirements documentation for validation package traceability
Investigated and resolved Sparta’s J2EE/Servlet-based TrackWise EQMS solution customer 2nd Tier issues
Investigation of issues performed both remotely over web meetings and internally through issue reproduction, analysis, database queries and Java source code reviews as necessary

Developed and executed custom SQL queries as necessary to determine if any data issues may be present, as well as execute department-approved scripts for certain identified issues (Oracle & SQL Server)
Developed internal license file utility to fetch and replace or add new license files for TrackWise software installations
License utility written in Java SE 7 utilizing Swing/AWT components as well as the Apache Commons framework for the actual file handling operations
Developed environment to aid the global team with any issues pertaining to our proprietary inbound & outbound web service APIs

Development environment contains several test J2EE services running Apache Tomcat 7, with the ability to generate custom WSDL-based web services on the fly to connect with TrackWise outbound web service configurations and reproduce issues

In addition, this environment also contains several Java Swing/AWT applications which implement Sparta’s proprietary inbound web service APIs connected to a test TrackWise environment to assist with any possible issue reproduction scenarios
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to determine innovative methodologies for issue resolution and contribute to a shared knowledge base

Maintain accurate, detailed and descriptive log of all open managed customer cases through Salesforce CRM ticketing system, providing suggestions and development improvements to management team through its use
Assisted client manual document file transfer and data entry activities
Traveled to Cincinnati, Ohio and Chennai, India for a ten-week technology training and on-boarding program
Handled various client inquiries and issues with our retail management software
Provided quality solutions for clients through a variety of methods such as web meetings, issue reproduction and analysis
Developed various SQL queries/statements for customer issue resolution as necessary
As the first and last person to greet all customers at various public and private events, ensured superior customer service and proper parking standards
Assured all customers needs were met, and were 100% satisfied with the service
Safely, responsibly and properly drove and parked customer's vehicles with care and precision
Assisted in the creation of removable dental appliances such as dentures, bleaching trays and mouth guards.
